wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Nott (13 August 1881 – 28 December 1959) was an English cricketer. He played for Gloucestershire between 1903 and 1912.

response: Baker scored a total of 23 runs in four innings with the bat, with a top score of 8. He made one catch, to dismiss Gloucestershire player Arthur Nott.
